name: Upon the Eighth Night
description:
🌜 Upon the Eighth Night 

How, then, am I mad? Hearken! and observe how healthily — how calmly I can tell you the whole story.

Embodies the Tell-Tale Heart's protagonist during the eighth night of his haunting plan.

🌛 🌜

  • Awesome music by L'Anonyme : Youtube - Soundcloud 
  • Sounds from Freesound or Feliyanstudio (or my friend Bogy)
  • Every image or art used is free to use generally from museo 

The game was made for the Edgar Allan Poe Jam, organized by Gamedevboi ! 

(If you are struggling, you can press space to restart the level, or even press the right arrow to pass it (except the last one))

Have fun, and thanks for playing !
